title: Black Login Screen for the 5th time this update
body: ok so every now and again when i click login and the page where username/password is completely black. music still plays but u cant type or do anything else. ive deleted the lol air client so many times its not funny. any1 have a clue as to how to stop this without waiting 2 hours for it to redownload the airclient?

replies.body:
Hi folks,

What kind of computer is this on? PC / Mac?  What version of Windows?

Cheers
Mindstar
its on a custom built PC with windows 7 (about to update to W10). a few of my friends have this same problem as well

Hey,

Thanks for the update - can you post a screenshot of the login screen when you have this issue by any chance?

Cheers
Mindstar

One suggestion I have from some of our team is to make sure you have an active Audio device, or try updating your Audio drivers.  There was a similar black login screen issue related to these in the past.
I think I have done all that, and I am still having the same issue...
I am getting the same issue and reinstalling hasn't helped at all :/
I have been having similar issues, I uninstalled and reinstalled the lol client and still black screen :s
